hero.image_alt: Professional solutions for companies in financial difficulties

services.title: Our Solutions for Companies in Financial Difficulties
services.subtitle: We offer three different paths forward depending on your company's situation and needs.

reconstruction.title: Restructuring
reconstruction.description: A legal process that gives your company protection from creditors and time to recover financially without going bankrupt.

settlement.title: Composition - arrangement with creditors
settlement.description: An agreement with creditors to pay part of the debt, allowing the company to continue operations.

acquisition.title: We Buy Your Company
acquisition.description: When restructuring is not possible, we buy your company and ensure that operations and jobs are preserved.

services_details.title: Three Paths Forward
services_details.subtitle: Depending on your company's situation and debt structure, we recommend different strategies. Read about the legal and practical aspects of each solution.

reconstruction.title: Restructuring
reconstruction.description: Restructuring is a legal process that gives companies with temporary financial difficulties the opportunity to recover without going bankrupt. During the restructuring period, the company receives protection from creditors and can focus on restoring profitability.
reconstruction.details: The process begins with an application to the district court and requires the company to show realistic possibilities for recovery. We help you through the entire process from application to implementation of the restructuring plan.

settlement.title: Composition - arrangement with creditors
settlement.description: Composition is an agreement between the company and its creditors to pay part of the debt instead of the full amount. This gives the company the opportunity to free itself from unsustainable debts and continue operations.
settlement.details: A composition requires that the majority of creditors approve the proposal. We help you prepare a credible composition proposal and negotiate with creditors to reach a sustainable solution.

acquisition.title: We Buy Your Company
acquisition.description: When restructuring or composition are not possible alternatives, we offer to buy your company. This ensures that operations can continue and jobs are preserved, while giving you as an entrepreneur a controlled exit.
acquisition.details: We evaluate the company's value and potential to offer a fair purchase price. The goal is to both secure the company's future and give you as a seller a dignified end to your entrepreneurship.

what_is.title: What is Corporate Restructuring?
what_is.description: Corporate restructuring is a legal process that gives companies with temporary financial difficulties the opportunity to get back on track without bankruptcy. Through restructuring, the company receives protection from creditors and time to reorganize operations.

step1.title: 1. Application
step1.description: The company applies for restructuring with the district court. We help you prepare the application and all necessary documentation.

step2.title: 2. Assessment
step2.description: The court assesses whether the company has the prerequisites for successful restructuring and appoints a restructuring administrator.

step3.title: 3. Restructuring Plan
step3.description: A detailed plan is developed for how the company will recover financially and become profitable again.

step4.title: 4. Implementation
step4.description: The plan is implemented under supervision of the restructuring administrator. We continuously monitor the process.

benefits.benefit5: Professional guidance throughout the entire process

what_is.title: What is composition?
what_is.description: Composition is an agreement between a company and its creditors whereby creditors accept a lower payment than what was originally owed. This can be an effective solution for companies experiencing financial difficulties but still having the potential to become profitable.

ackord.process_image_alt: Professional team working on composition negotiations

step1.title: 1. Analysis and preparation
step1.description: We conduct a thorough analysis of the company's financial situation and identify opportunities for a successful composition agreement.

step2.title: 2. Negotiation with creditors
step2.description: We negotiate with creditors to reach an agreement that is both acceptable to them and sustainable for the company.

step3.title: 3. Implementation and follow-up
step3.description: Once the agreement is in place, we help with implementation and monitor that the company lives up to its commitments.

benefits.title: Benefits of composition
benefits.1: Avoids bankruptcy and its negative consequences
benefits.2: Reduces debt burden and improves cash flow
benefits.5: Less formal and expensive than other alternatives

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.cookiesExplanation: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with the best experience by remembering your preferences, analyzing how the website is used, and helping with our marketing efforts.
cookiePolicy.useExplanation: We use different types of cookies for different purposes. Some are necessary for the website to function, while others help us improve your experience.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you have made in the past, like your preferred language or region. They enhance your user experience by personalizing the website.

statistics.title: Statistics Cookies
statistics.description: These cookies collect information about how you use our website, which pages you visited and which links you clicked on. All of the data is anonymized and cannot be used to identify you.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies track your online activity to help advertisers deliver more relevant advertising or to limit how many times you see an ad. They may share this information with other organizations or advertisers.

cookiePolicy.manageDescription: You can change your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the button below. You can also delete cookies that are already stored on your device through your browser settings.
cookiePolicy.contactDescription: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at info@reconstructor.se.
